title: icopress
author: icopress
created_time: June 10, 2022, 02:08:40 PMLast edit: December 25, 2023, 01:32:06 PM by icopress
content: Quote from:   ➥ Your private Bitcoin Wallet for desktop [Wasabi Website] & [Thread]  ➥ Live statistics [Here] & [list of participants]The guys from the Wasabi team agreed with me that it is on Bitcointalk that you can get the most constructive feedback, so I am looking for forum users whose reviews will potentially help improve Wasabi. I expect each of the accepted participants to install the desktop version of the Wallet and write a deployed review of at least 1000 characters. Also, feel free to run the wallet in different modes, then it will be easier for you to present ideas on how to improve usability.Payment:➥ Payments will be processed as reviews are received.➥ Full/Sr/Hero/Legendary (3x) - 0.002 btc/review (one-time payment).➥ You will have at least 3 weeks to edit your post or publish a new one (starting June 27th.).Rules:➥ Post a review in this thread / Be constructive!➥ Posts that do not carry a semantic load or posts whose content is less than 1000 characters will not be paid.➥ Suggestions, ideas, criticism are welcome only if it's not abstract.➥ I reserve the right to change the rules and disqualify any review and any participant for any reason.➥ Only 1 review per user / can't believe I'm writing this obvious note.➥ In the second post you will see your name if you have been accepted (I will announce the list of those accepted on June 27th).Download for Desktop                                                [/list][/list]Code:Or build it from source:https://github.com/zkSNACKs/WalletWasabi#build-from-source-codePGP (6FB3 872B 5D42 292F 5992 0797 8563 4832 8949 861E)

comments.author: Gianluca95
comments.body: Hi there,I'm really interested in try this review campaign.So,Code:Username: Gianluca95BTC Segwit address: bc1qjqu3y67fpzqwc08l4fww8337yq2dpd4ssvndgvThe only thing that I don't understand is: Why you say payment: 0.002 BTC/Post if review that every user will release is only 1?

comments.author: icopress
comments.body: Quote from: Gianluca95 on June 19, 2022, 03:14:59 PMThe only thing that I don't understand is: Why you say payment: 0.002 BTC/Post if review that every user will release is only 1?Fixed! Also please use Code:

comments.author: Gianluca95
comments.body: Quote from: icopress on June 19, 2022, 03:16:37 PMQuote from: Gianluca95 on June 19, 2022, 03:14:59 PMThe only thing that I don't understand is: Why you say payment: 0.002 BTC/Post if review that every user will release is only 1?Fixed! Also please use [code ][ /code]As now you've edited your post, for every review you'll pay that amount? This mean that I can post a review every week?

comments.author: icopress
comments.body: Quote from: Gianluca95 on June 19, 2022, 03:17:41 PMAs now you've edited your post, for every review you'll pay that amount? This mean that I can post a review every week?I didn't highlight the note clearly enough?You can do multiple reviews but you will still get a one time payment (if you want and if you get accepted).

comments.author: Gianluca95
comments.body: Quote from: icopress on June 19, 2022, 03:20:55 PMQuote from: Gianluca95 on June 19, 2022, 03:17:41 PMAs now you've edited your post, for every review you'll pay that amount? This mean that I can post a review every week?I didn't highlight the note clearly enough?No Sir, as I read hereQuote➥ Full/Sr/Hero/Legendary (30x) - 0.002 btc/review (one-time payment).What I understand is that I'll be paid 0.002 BTC for each review that I'll release, that's why I've asked to you if I understand well or not.If payment is only for one review, please correct this and insert something like: QuoteYou'll be paid 0.002 BTC for your review !Edit: Thanks for the note that you've added, that sentence can create confusion for some user, that's why I've asked to you to precise this point. Thanks sir.

comments.author: icopress
comments.body: I'm sorry but I thought it was too obvious to write about it.

comments.author: BlackHatCoiner
comments.body: Username: BlackHatCoinerBTC Address (SegWit): bc1qkt6d7tsffuf9zwnvwqywt406h2slg5tgtf8ydhIt is important to mention that the minimum amount required to participate in Wasabi's CoinJoin is currently 0.10584712 BTC, something I don't cross my fingers most users own. (And are willing to test)

comments.author: icopress
comments.body: Quote from: jamyr on June 19, 2022, 04:46:21 PMForgive my inattention ... I will announce the list of accepted participants in about a week.I just don't quite like the first-come-first-served rule (for this particular case).
